name: Italian Feather Bread Pizza Dough
author: lizard_c9
summary: This recipe came from my nonna who immigrated from Italy at 40 and members of my family have been making it for years. It is the best! I hope you enjoy it. My fiance said I should sell it! Lol!
ingredients: 3 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste
3 cups all-purpose flour, plus more as needed
directions: Beat water, olive oil, yeast, sugar, and salt together with an electric mixer until evenly combined, about 2 minutes
Add flour, 1 cup at a time, stirring with a wooden spoon after each addition, until dough almost comes away from the sides of the bowl
Knead the dough with your hands until soft and smooth
Lightly oil a bowl and place dough in the bowl, flipping to coat all of the dough
Let dough rest for 5 to 10 minutes
